title: Exclusive Bundle
summary: Enjoy three different styles of watch faces each with dozens of custom features.
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37- A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Exclusive Bundle is a collection of a diverse watch faces to enhance your options to stylize your smart wear. You can enjoy three different styles of watch faces each with dozens of custom features. Awesome built-in features include ambient mode of all the styles, weather information, Battery status, Humidity level, date and much more.Watch360 is focused in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and required keen concentration to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Latest Weather updates• Classic Design• Ultimate readability • Clean and simplistic look • Hi contrast and high colors• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everExclusive Bundle is designed for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live, Asus zenwatch and sony smartwatch 3. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com
descriptionHTML:
Exclusive Bundle is a collection of a diverse watch faces to enhance your options to stylize your smart wear. You can enjoy three different styles of watch faces each with dozens of custom features. Awesome built-in features include ambient mode of all the styles, weather information, Battery status, Humidity level, date and much more.
Watch360 is focused in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and required keen concentration to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.
Key custom features:-
• Latest Weather updates
• Classic Design
• Ultimate readability
• Clean and simplistic look
• Hi contrast and high colors
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever
Exclusive Bundle is designed for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live, Asus zenwatch and sony smartwatch 3. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com
